alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 02 at 1:43AM MDT until November 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches in the lower Elevations; 4 to 8 inches on Casper Mountain. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range, Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
